name: About
body: Hi guys my name is Gabi but people call me Gavin. I am a programmer and I created a lot of things in my life. I started programming at a very young age and I was self taught. According to some people  I was really good so I created many things for them like websites apps games and all sorts of things. I love programming and its a great hobby, so I hope you like this page were I'll show you the things that I create. :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
